data.title: Phi Theta Kappa: International College Honor Society
data.meta_description: Helping students achieve academic and career success through college scholarships and leadership training since 1918.
data.text:
Slide

Your key to a world of opportunities

Phi Theta Kappa's mission is to recognize and celebrate students' academic achievements. PTK provides opportunities to cultivate professional and leadership skills, secure scholarships, explore diverse career paths, and build a network of supportive peers and colleagues that last a lifetime.

Your key to a world of opportunities

Phi Theta Kappa's mission is to recognize and celebrate students' academic achievements. PTK provides opportunities to cultivate professional and leadership skills, secure scholarships, explore diverse career paths, and build a network of supportive peers and colleagues that last a lifetime.

Unlock Your Full Potential with Phi Theta Kappa

Member Benefits

Get access to professional development and leadership courses, live webinars focusing on real time opportunities and issues, partner benefits and discounts, and PTK Connect, a robust tool for college transfer and scholarship searches — membership in PTK offers a variety of benefits that cater to members’ educational, professional, and personal growth.

Scholarships

Learn how scholarships work, how to create a strong application, and apply for PTK members-only scholarships. PTK Connect helps you navigate the transfer process with hundreds of school profiles and other resources to maximize your academic success and help find ways to fund your education.

Professional & Personal Development

Members have unlimited access to a variety of courses to help you prepare for transfer to a four-year college, develop career skills, and foster personal growth. Take these courses at a time and pace that fits your schedule.

Leadership

Leadership training and opportunities are a core part of the PTK mission. We have programs, courses, and real-word ways to gain a deeper understanding of what it means to be an effective leader and serve in a leadership role — from the chapter to international level.

Community

PTK members join a vibrant community of scholars and leaders — making connections that strengthen their personal and professional networks. With lots of ways to get involved, you can make your PTK experience support your goals.

Events

Connect with your PTK community at events held at your local chapter, in your region, and at our annual international convention, PTK Catalyst. Find out what events and activities are taking place and make your plans to go now!

Unlock Your Potential

Learn about the benefits of becoming a PTK member in this short and informative video. Select English or Spanish, and then click the video to play.

Connect with Us

🚨New Transfer Scholarship Alert🚨⁠

⁠

The University of Akron (UA) in Ohio has a established a new $2,000 scholarship for Phi Theta Kappa members transferring to the university.⁠

⁠

Learn more about this new scholarship opportunity and the University of Akron at the link ...in our bio!⁠

⁠

phithetakappa

Walk into the fall semester with confidence👑

phithetakappa

We are proud to announce the launch of PTK's new FAFSA Mentoring Tool, designed to support students in navigating the complexities of the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA) process. PTK members will have free access to this exclusive tool that aims to empower high-achieving ...community college students by providing expert guidance and streamlining the financial aid application process. ⁠

⁠

Learn more about this new tool at the link in our bio. ⁠

⁠

#fafsa #studentaid #ptk⁠

phithetakappa

Dr. Lynn Tincher-Ladner has been selected as the Co-Chair of the Commission on Student Success for the American Association of Community Colleges, where she also serves on the Board of Directors. ⁠

⁠

Learn more at the link in our bio.

phithetakappa

You don't have to wait for the Olympics to get all of your PTK Edge badges. Start today!🥇

phithetakappa

Voting is an important part of being a #CivicScholar. That's why PTK is promoting the Community College Concert Competition! ⁠

⁠

Student voter turnout at community colleges is nearly 10 percentage points lower than at public four-year universities. The nonpartisan Community College... Concert Competition with @levis and @MTV and in partnership with @allintovote, @slsvcoalition, and Good Trouble Collaborative is a nationwide effort to close that gap. 🎉⁠

⁠

To enter, community colleges will commit to a series of activations to promote nonpartisan student voter engagement. Are you ready to celebrate our democracy and work to win a free concert on #VoteEarlyDay by a major musical artist on your campus?⁠

⁠

Learn more about how you and your chapter can join the competition and sign up at the link in our bio!
